text: Argo is a crater in the Meridiani Planum on Mars, which was visited by the Opportunity rover on approximately its 365th Martian sol. The crater is about south of the heat shield and Heat Shield Rock. ==See also== *List of craters on Mars *Geography of Mars *List of surface features of Mars imaged by Opportunity ==External links== * Official Mars Rovers website Category:Impact craters on Mars Category:Mars Exploration Rover mission Category:Arabia quadrangle
title: Argo (crater)
